role: Senior Software Engineer & Full Stack Developer
topParagraph: As a Senior Software Engineer with over #YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE# years of total experience, I bring a wealth of experience in building full-stack solutions and leading both new and existing projects. My expertise lies in backend development with Java and Spring Framework, as well as frontend development with Angular. I prefer to work with modern containerized microservice environments, and strive to modernize existing systems to adopt containerization.
bottomParagraph:
I am an energetic team player and effective communicator, proficient in leading Agile Scrum teams. I am passionate about taking on challenges that can have a positive impact on the world and strive to deliver excellent quality, maintainable solutions that meet requirements and deadlines.
Overall, my experience and skills make me a valuable asset to any team looking for a results-driven and passionate Senior Software Engineer.
